consent.title: User Consent & Legal Disclaimer
consent.message: Welcome to Secure QR & Link Scanner. Please read the following before proceeding:
consent.p1: This app scans QR codes and links using local analysis and external databases (USOM, GitHub malicious domains).
consent.p2: Risk analysis is for informational purposes only and does not guarantee 100% security.
consent.p3: You are solely responsible for any actions taken based on the app's results.
consent.p4: The developer is not liable for any damages or security breaches arising from use.
consent.p5: Your data is private; scans are processed locally or checked against public lists without storing personal history.
consent.p6: By tapping "I Agree", you acknowledge and accept these terms.
classifier.brandMismatchWarning: Brand keyword does not match domain
disclaimer.title: Legal Disclaimer
disclaimer.intro: Secure QR & Link Scanner analyzes URLs and QR codes using local heuristics and external security databases (USOM, GitHub malicious lists) to identify potential threats.
disclaimer.service.title: 1. Service Description
disclaimer.service.body: This application provides risk analysis for links and QR codes. It checks against:
disclaimer.service.item1: USOM (National Cyber Security Incident Response Center): Checks if the domain is listed in USOM's harmful URL list (https://www.usom.gov.tr/api/).
disclaimer.service.item2: GitHub Malicious Domains: Checks against the 'romainmarcoux/malicious-domains' repository.
disclaimer.service.item3: Local Heuristics: Checks for suspicious patterns (IP addresses, non-standard ports, etc.).
disclaimer.liability.title: 2. Limitation of Liability
disclaimer.liability.body: The developer provides this application "as is" without any warranties. While we strive for accuracy, we do not guarantee 100% detection of all threats. The developer is not liable for any direct or indirect damages, data loss, or security breaches resulting from the use of this application.
disclaimer.responsibility.title: 3. User Responsibility
disclaimer.responsibility.body: You are solely responsible for your actions based on the application's results. A "Safe" result does not guarantee that a link is completely harmless. Always exercise caution.
disclaimer.privacy.title: 4. Data Privacy
disclaimer.privacy.body: We respect your privacy. Scanned links are processed to detect risks but we do not store your personal browsing history on external servers.
camera.permission.message: Camera access is required to scan codes
scan.footer.text: All scans are processed on your device; no data is shared.
download_unavailable_detail: Saving an image requires an extra module. It works on Web; on native we can add SVG/extra module support.

onboarding.slide1.title: Welcome to Secure QR & Link Scanner
onboarding.slide1.desc: Quickly scan QR codes and barcodes, analyze suspicious links before opening them, and create your own QR codes in seconds.
onboarding.slide2.title: Advanced Security Analysis
onboarding.slide2.desc: We check your connection's safety by scanning the QR codes and links against USOM and the romainmarcoux/malicious-domains GitHub repository's malicious link lists.
onboarding.slide2.examples: Example sources: alienvault-banking-phishtank, openphish.com, phishing.army, malwarebytes.com
scan.barcodeSafeDesc: Barcodes are safe as they do not contain links.
scan.israelProduct: This product is made in Israel.
onboarding.slide3.title: Advanced Local Security Analysis
onboarding.slide3.desc: With our custom-developed advanced algorithm, we can detect suspicious TLDs, IP-based addresses, homographic attacks, and brand spoofing.
onboarding.slide4.title: Versatile Scanning
onboarding.slide4.desc: Scan from your camera or select an image from your gallery. We support standard QRs, barcodes, and even complex Wi-Fi codes.
onboarding.slide5.title: Create and Share
onboarding.slide5.desc: Create your own custom QR codes for URLs, text, Wi-Fi, and more. Share them instantly with friends or colleagues.
onboarding.slide6.title: Personalization and Privacy
onboarding.slide6.desc: Personalize your experience with Dark and Light Mode options. Manage your scan history, which is stored locally on your device.
qr_type_unlock_desc: Use this QR type by going Premium or watching a rewarded ad.
custom_qr_unlock_desc: Go Premium or watch a rewarded ad to add logo and frame text.
custom_qr_subtitle: Stand out with logo, frame, and text
